mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM oas_announcementsextent a left join oas_announcements b on a.announcementsExtent_announcementsId = b.announcements_id) a left join oas_department b on a.announcementsExtent_departmentId = b.dep_id) a left join oas_staff b on a.announcements_notifierId = b.staff_id where a.dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and announcements_state = 0
SELECT * FROM oas_department a WHERE a.dep_name = #{depName}
SELECT * FROM oas_staff a LEFT JOIN oas_department b on a.staff_depID = b.dep_id where dep_name=#{depName}
mapper.insert: insert into oas_department (dep_id, dep_name, dep_managerid, dep_number, dep_describe) values (#{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depManagerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into oas_department
dep_id,
dep_name,
dep_managerid,
dep_number,
dep_describe,

mapper.update:
update oas_department
dep_name = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dep_managerid = #{depManagerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dep_number = #{depNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dep_describe = #{depDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
